problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is NOT an advantage to using waste vegetable oil as an ingredient of biodiesel fuel?<<
() it reuses a waste product () it prevents disposal of oil into storm sewers () it uses modern carbon (carbon in play) rather than fossil carbon (x) it reduces vehicular traffic () it burns more cleanly than diesel from fossil fuel
[explanation] Using waste vegetable oil does not have any influence on how much people drive. In fact if it is slightly less expensive, it might encourage slightly more driving. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following is NOT an advantage to using waste vegetable oil as an ingredient of biodiesel fuel?

choicegroup.label: Which of the following is NOT an advantage to using waste vegetable oil as an ingredient of biodiesel fuel?
choicegroup.choice: it prevents disposal of oil into storm sewers
it uses modern carbon (carbon in play) rather than fossil carbon
it burns more cleanly than diesel from fossil fuel

div.p: Using waste vegetable oil does not have any influence on how much people drive. In fact if it is slightly less expensive, it might encourage slightly more driving.
